definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ct So 2:15 fox, perhaps also jackal;—abs. ´[[שׁ]]: Ne 3:25; pl. [[שׁוּעָלִים]] Ju Jdg 15:4 +, ´[[שֻׁ]]: Ez Eze 13:4, Ct So 2:15 b;—fox (prob.) Ne 3:25, Ct So 2:15, So 2:15; perh. (fr. large no.) jackal Ju Jdg 15:4; as haunting ruins Ez Eze 13:4, La 5:18; eating offal Ps 63:11.
